title: This is New York
creator_credit: Morton Schindel, Sonny Fox, Weston Woods Studios and M. Sasek
brief_description: New York City from a child’s viewpoint. A French boy and his papa visit New York, and the wide-eyed boy describes what he sees and tells some of the facts he has learned about the city. Adapted from Miroslav Sasek’s book ‘This is New York’ for children.
creator_credit_for_label: Morton Schindel, Sonny Fox, Weston Woods Studios and M. Sasek
